question:
Which quote was spoken in the movie:
"Star Wars: Episode V - The Empire Strikes Back"?
answers: "Luke, I am your brother."
"Luke, I am your father."
"Luke, I am your uncle."
Luke, I am your mentor.

question:
Which quote was spoken in the movie:
"Star Wars: Episode III - Revenge of the Sith"?
answers: "I'm in danger, Skywalker. Save me."
"I'm here to save you, Obi-Wan."
"I'm not in danger, Skywalker. I'm here to save you."
"I'm here to fight Darth Vader."
correct_answer: "I'm not in danger, Skywalker. I'm here to save you."

question:
Which quote was spoken in the TV series:
"Friends"?
answers: "Remember, everyone is perfect."
"Remember, mistakes cannot be forgiven."
"Remember, perfection is unattainable."
"Remember, nobody's perfect. Everyone makes mistakes, but it's important to learn from them."
correct_answer: "Remember, nobody's perfect. Everyone makes mistakes, but it's important to learn from them."

question:
Which quote was spoken in the movie:
"Braveheart"?
answers: "The world belongs to those who are rich and powerful."
"The world belongs to those who follow the rules."
"The world belongs to those who are lucky."
"The world belongs to those who are brave enough to seize it."
correct_answer: "The world belongs to those who are brave enough to seize it."

question:
Which quote was spoken in the movie:
"The Notebook"?
answers: "If you love someone, let them go."
"If you love someone, hold onto them with all your might."
"If you love someone, never let them go."
"If you love someone, they will always be yours."
correct_answer: "If you love someone, let them go."

question:
Which quote was spoken in the movie:
"The Pursuit of Happyness"?
answers: "Don't listen to others and follow your dreams."
"If people tell you that you can't do something, it means you can."
"Give up on your dream if it's too difficult."
"Don't let anyone tell you that you can't do something. If you have a dream, you have to protect it."
correct_answer: "Don't let anyone tell you that you can't do something. If you have a dream, you have to protect it."

question:
Which quote was spoken in the movie:
"Into the Woods"?
answers: "I believe that everything happens for a reason. Destiny brings us to the people who are meant to enter our lives."
"I believe that all coincidences are random."
"Destiny doesn't exist. Following it will never bring someone into your life."
"No matter what obstacles we face, our hope will guide us."
correct_answer: "I believe that everything happens for a reason. Destiny brings us to the people who are meant to enter our lives."

question:
Which quote was spoken in the movie:
"The Truman Show"?
answers: "To live is to die slowly."
"To live is to be in the present moment."
"Memories are meaningless."
"Life is a gift that we must cherish."

question:
Which quote was spoken in the movie:
"A Bronx Tale"?
answers: "Forgiveness changes nothing. Just be yourself."
"To be happy, you don't need anyone's forgiveness."
"Forgiveness is weakness."
"You can never truly be yourself until you forgive yourself."
correct_answer: "You can never truly be yourself until you forgive yourself."

question:
Which quote was spoken in the movie:
"Mission: Impossible"?
answers: "In life, there are many impossible things."
"Impossibility is reality."
"Impossible is just a temporary illusion."
"Illusions don't matter."
